column15: 2015) send sympathy card barbara jean barb bosbous
column20: 2015 at the hospice of the eup - hospice house. barb was born may 30
column22: michigan to the late russell and constance (lyons) allen. she graduated from sault high school with the class of 1976. she continued her education at davenport business college where she earned an associates degree. on january 31
column24: barb married john bosbous in sault ste. marie
column25: michigan. they had three children together and remained friends through the years. barb moved to colorado springs
column26: colorado where she lived for many years and worked in property management. she returned to the soo in april of 2013. she enjoyed playing bingo
column29: and her online friends. at one time barb was known for selling jewelry. barb is survived by her children: brad (lauren) bosbous of sault ste. marie
column31: lacie (jason) wojnaroski of sault ste. marie
column33: and kamie lancaster of arizona; six grandchildren: faith
column37: and her furry one bella; and her significant other: dave ingle of sault ste. marie
column38: mi. barb is also survived by six of her siblings: steve allen of costa rica
column44: and ronnie bumstead of sault ste. marie
column45: mi. barb was preceded in death by her parents and four siblings: robert lyons
column48: and kathy lyons. a memorial service will be held at 12:00 pm on friday
column50: 2015 at c. s. mulder funeral home with pastor dave pearce officiating. friends may call at the funeral home that same day from 10:00 am until the time of the service. interment will be at riverside cemetery. print back 2005 - 2015 c. s. mulder funeral home and cremation services 4951 s. m-129
